Pre-Game Insights: Manolo Márquez begins his tenure as coach of the Indian national team in the Intercontinental Cup opener against Mauritius
India and Mauritius are using the Intercontinental Cup as preparation for their competitive matches ahead
Márquez emphasized the importance of preparing for the AFC Asian Cup Qualifiers
Others: The match will take place at the GMC Balayogi Athletic Stadium in Hyderabad on September 3, 2024, and will be broadcast/streamed on Sports 18 3 and JioCinema
Tickets for the Intercontinental Cup can be purchased here
Guillaume Moullec is the head coach of Mauritius
